snippet: During Nelson Mandela’s hospitalization, Winnie Madikizela-Mandela, his former wife, has made an ostentatious re-entry into the public arena.
abstract: Saturday Profile of Winnie Madikizela-Mandela, ex-wife of former South African Pres Nelson Mandela; before her fall from grace, Madikizela-Mandela was one of the key public figures in the country's long struggle for nonracial democracy; during Nelson Mandela's hospitalization, she is ostentatiously trying to re-enter the public arena and emphasize her claim to part of the Mandela legacy.
lead_paragraph: During Nelson Mandela’s hospitalization, Winnie Madikizela-Mandela, his former wife, has made an ostentatious re-entry into the public arena.

headline.print_headline: In Mandela Legacy, a Place for Winnie?
headline.main: In Mandela Legacy, a Place for Winnie?
